author: aguzmant
content:
Hi Damian, a pleasure! I think you've met folks from PSE right? For Kohaku the work it's still internal/not a public repo or roadmap (still working on legal stuff so it's well positioned to make it public)

The only thing I can say is that it's based on a fork from Ambire wallet so perhaps there's opportunity to study an integration and then have that merged into Kohaku. 

I'll let Kohaku lead know about this idea
